Emojicode Documentation 0.5β
Guides Language Reference Package Index

Package

sockets

Initializers

🆕

Methods

💬 🙅 👂

Class 📞

📞 represents a socket for communication between client and server.

Initializers

🆕

🔓 🐈 🆕 host 🔡 service 🔡

Opens a socket to address. address can be a host name which will be resolved.

Methods

💬

🔓 🐖 💬 message 📇 ➡️ 👌

Sends the given data to the peer. Returns true if the data was successfully sent or false on error.

🙅

🔓 🐖 🙅 ➡️ ✨

Closes this socket.

👂

🔓 🐖 👂 bytes 🚂 ➡️ 🍬📇

Tries to read up to bytes bytes from the socket. Nothingness is returned on error or if the socket was closed by the peer.
